comments:
In order to persist some custom notation information, I have extended from GMF notation model and created a custom notation style - DeployStyle. So far I added two attributes in it, one is "duplicate" which indicates whether a node object on the diagram is a duplicate, the other is "externalHostee" which indicates if a hostee is in its host's hosting list or on the diagram.

After extending notation model, I generated model code in core.ui project and modified the UnitViewFactory and UnitGroupViewFactory to add this DeployStyle in the newly created view object. After restarting, everything worked well but the unit tab of properties view. After I selected a unit on the diagram, selected the unit tab in the properties view, no properties showed, and the following exception stack was thrown out: 

  !MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.tabbed".
!STACK 0

After debuging and digging through google, I found that a GMF bug caused this exception. 
( NPE inorg.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.ui.properties.sections.PropertySheetEntry
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=145324)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 145324 ***
